openings.title: Postdoctoral Fellow — Quantum Communications
openings.summary: Lead experimental/theory efforts on photonic quantum communications and networking with NRC/uOttawa collaborators.
responsibilities: Design & execute experiments/simulations in photonic QKD and networking.
Publish in top venues; present at conferences.
Mentor students and coordinate with collaborators.
requirements: PhD in physics, maths, or related field (completed or near completion).
Strong background in quantum optics/communications or photonics.
openings.how_to_apply: Email a single PDF (CV, brief statement, 2–3 references) with subject “Application – Postdoc – Your Name”.
